items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
8% increased Attack Speed
+63 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: The Taming
explicitMods: 20% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Freeze, Shock or Ignite on Enemy
+26% to all Elemental Resistances
30% increased Elemental Damage
10% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
flavourText: "Moon after moon did Berek make fools
Of the great and Untamed Three
Until malice for a Brother
Slew the hatred of the Other
And Berek did hunt
Alone and free."
- Berek and the Untamed

items.name: Pandemonium Thunder
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality
explicitMods: Adds 151 to 262 Cold Damage
Adds 34 to 551 Lightning Damage
31% increased Critical Strike Chance
29% increased Projectile Speed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds fire damage to the attacks and spells of you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
You and nearby allies deal 109 to 155 additional Fire Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 109 to 155 additional Fire Damage with Spells
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.

You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, this skill will cause them to explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. This damage is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

Damage cannot be Reflected
Base radius is 1.2 metres
Buff grants 38 to 56 Added Attack Cold Damage
Buff grants 38 to 56 Added Spell Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Atziri's Promise
explicitMods: Gain 7% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 7% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

items.name: Cinderswallow Urn
explicitMods: +90 to Maximum Charges
Recharges 5 Charges when you Consume an Ignited corpse
198% increased Charges per use
15% of Damage Taken from Hits is Leeched as Life during Effect
Enemies Ignited by you during Effect take 8% increased Damage
Recover 3% of Life when you Kill an Enemy during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Rat's Nest
explicitMods: 15% increased Attack Speed
75% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
150% increased Evasion Rating
22% increased Rarity of Items found
10% increased Movement Speed
10% reduced Character Size
flavourText: A lad with no fear of the pest
Let rats fill his helmet in jest
When they picked his skull clean
Where his head should have been
Was naught but a vermin-filled nest!

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow into the air to land at a targeted location, dealing area damage. The arrow sticks in the ground where it lands, and periodically fires a beam of lightning to another arrow near it, dealing area damage between them.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Arrows fire Beams every 0.41 seconds
Maximum 100 Arrows in the ground
Each Arrow can fire 4 Beams

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.

Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies

items.descrText: Right click to apply this to your weapons. Only one Tincture in your belt can be applied to your weapons at a time. Requires the Coated Blade Passive to be allocated on Warden of the Maji Passive Skill Tree to use this item.

Adds 1 to 2 Fire Damage to Attacks per 10 Strength

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: +51 to Strength
+48 to Dexterity
+54 to maximum Life
22% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit. There is a maximum of 50 Resonance for each Element. Cannot support triggered skills, instant skills, orb skills, brands, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods:
Hits with Supported Skills for which the highest Damage Type is Elemental cause you to gain 25 Resonance of other Elements per second for 2 seconds
Lose 5 Resonance per second of each Element you are not gaining
Supported Skills deal 3% more Elemental Damage per 5 of lowest Resonance
Supported Skills penetrate 16% Elemental Resistances while each Resonance is at least 25
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Elemental Damage
